name: Sticky situation (petikesajt)
description:
You are a slime block who needs to make various shapes. Everything attaches to everything so be careful to not touch the wall because that's game over.

Movement: Arrows

The game only exist in one color. (Black does not count.)

The game has 5 levels incrised in difficulty.

It is made in console application so it has it's limitations and can be laggy.
